00033 /**
00034  * \file
00035  *         I2C communication device driver header file for Zolertia Z1 sensor node.
00036  * \author
00037  *         Enric Calvo, Zolertia <ecalvo@zolertia.com>
00038  *         Marcus Lund√©n, SICS <mlunden@sics.se>
00039  */

00041 #ifndef __I2CMASTER_H__
00042 #define __I2CMASTER_H__
00043 
00044 #include <stdio.h>
00045 #include <signal.h>
00046 #include <io.h>
00047 #include <contiki.h>
00048 #include <dev/spi.h>
00049 #include <dev/leds.h>
00050 
00051 void i2c_enable(void);
00052 
00053 void i2c_receiveinit(u8_t slave_address);
00054 u8_t i2c_receive_n(u8_t byte_ctr, u8_t *rx_buf);
00055 
00056 void i2c_transmitinit(u8_t slave_address);
00057 void i2c_transmit_n(u8_t byte_ctr, u8_t *tx_buf);
00058 
00059 u8_t i2c_busy(void);
00060 
00061 //XXX Temporary place for defines that are lacking in mspgcc4's gpio.h
00062 #ifndef P5SEL2_
00063   #define P5SEL2_             0x0045  /* Port 5 Selection 2*/
00064   sfrb(P5SEL2, P5SEL2_);
00065 #endif
00066 //XXX Should these defines be in the contiki-conf.h to make it more platform-independent?
00067 #define I2C_PxDIR   P5DIR
00068 #define I2C_PxIN    P5IN
00069 #define I2C_PxOUT   P5OUT
00070 #define I2C_PxSEL   P5SEL
00071 #define I2C_PxSEL2  P5SEL2
00072 #define I2C_PxREN   P5REN
00073 
00074 
00075 #define I2C_SDA       (1 << 1)    //SDA == P5.1 
00076 #define I2C_SCL       (1 << 2)    //SCL == P5.2
00077 #define I2C_PRESC_1KHZ_LSB      0x00 
00078 #define I2C_PRESC_1KHZ_MSB      0x20
00079 #define I2C_PRESC_100KHZ_LSB    0x50 
00080 #define I2C_PRESC_100KHZ_MSB    0x00
00081 #define I2C_PRESC_400KHZ_LSB    0x14 
00082 #define I2C_PRESC_400KHZ_MSB    0x00
00083 
00084 // I2C configuration with RX interrupts
00085 #ifdef I2C_CONF_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT
00086 #define I2C_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT I2C_CONF_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT // XXX Move I2C_CONF_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT to contiki-conf.h or platform-conf.h
00087 #else /* I2C_CONF_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT */
00088 #define I2C_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT 1
00089 #endif /* I2C_CONF_RX_WITH_INTERRUPT */
00090

00096 #endif

00098 #endif    /* #ifdef __I2CMASTER_H__ */
